description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 2/16/2006

Felicia wants the father of Dominick to be Nick. Taylor says that Dante is the father and Felicia is shocked. Felicia thinks this is a nightmare and Dante wants everyone to know. Stephanie can’t accept Felicia dying, however she is happy that Bridget and Nick will raise Dominick. . Bridget gets emotional when she sees a pink blanket that was supposed to be for Nicole, but she calms down when she sees a photo of Nick and Dominick. Nick sings a song he was writing for Nicole and becomes emotional. Bridget decides to have a memorial for Nicole and calls Stephanie to let her know.
